class_001.title: Beginner's First Wave
class_001.description: Perfect introduction to surfing. Learn basic techniques, ocean safety, and catch your first waves with experienced instructors.

class_002.title: Intermediate Wave Riders
class_002.description: Take your surfing to the next level. Focus on improving technique, wave selection, and building confidence in bigger conditions.

class_003.title: Early Morning Session
class_003.description: Catch the best waves at dawn. Perfect for early risers who want to start their day with amazing surf.

class_004.title: Sunset Surf Experience
class_004.description: End your day with a magical sunset session. Great lighting and usually calmer conditions.

class_005.title: Advanced Performance
class_005.description: For experienced surfers looking to master advanced maneuvers, competitive techniques, and big wave surfing.

class_006.title: Teen Surf Camp
class_006.description: Special program for teenagers. Learn surfing while making friends and having fun in a safe environment.

class_007.title: Private Beginner Lesson
class_007.description: One-on-one instruction perfect for beginners who want personalized attention and faster progression.

class_008.title: Private Intermediate Coaching
class_008.description: Personalized coaching session focused on your specific goals and technique improvement.

class_009.title: Elite Private Training
class_009.description: High-performance training for competitive surfers or those seeking rapid improvement.

class_010.title: Private Family Session
class_010.description: Exclusive session for your family group (up to 4 people). Learn together at your own pace.

class_011.title: VIP Surf Experience
class_011.description: Premium private lesson with video analysis, professional photography, and equipment included.

class_012.title: Little Groms (Ages 5-8)
class_012.description: Fun introduction to surfing for young children. Parents participate to ensure safety and bonding.

class_013.title: Family Wave Adventure
class_013.description: Parents and children (ages 8-14) learn together. Build confidence and create lasting memories.

class_014.title: Tiny Surfers (Ages 3-5)
class_014.description: Super gentle introduction to the ocean. Parents in the water at all times with their little ones.

class_015.title: Teen & Parent Bonding
class_015.description: Special session for parents with teenagers. Learn together while respecting individual pace.

class_016.title: Grandparent Special
class_016.description: Gentle session designed for grandparents and grandchildren. Focus on fun and safety.

class_017.title: Weekend Warrior Group
class_017.description: Perfect for busy professionals. Intensive weekend session to maximize your time on the water.

class_018.title: Ladies Only Session
class_018.description: Supportive environment for women to learn surfing together. All levels welcome.

class_019.title: Adaptive Surf Program
class_019.description: Specialized instruction for surfers with disabilities. Trained instructors and adaptive equipment available.

class_020.title: Competition Prep Private
class_020.description: Intensive private coaching for upcoming competitions. Strategy, technique, and mental preparation.
